summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by updating `body` background-position for both the default (mobile) rule and the `@media (min-width: 768px)` (desktop) rule in `frontend/src/index.css`, shifting 3in left and 2in down while keeping `background-size: cover` and leaving the referenced background asset paths unchanged. Two additional non-requested files were also modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `frontend-file-summaries.txt`, which is not part of the requested CSS-only change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to adjust `background-position` values in `frontend/src/index.css` and includes constraints about not modifying unrelated areas; no requirement mentions updating repository summary files.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `project_state.json`, which is not part of the requested CSS-only change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request any change to project tracking/state files; only `frontend/src/index.css` background-position adjustments are specified.
